typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		fruit as string,
		size as string,
		color as string,
		datetime as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> MongoExportedFile
MongoExportedFile derive(date = fruit+toString(toDate(datetime))) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> NewFile4Mongo
